task.summary: Default task
Cleanup JSLint warning in flextour.js
Update to the latest version.
Split up things for easier maintainance.
split into scripts and styles folders
Remove files
Add Listening events and cleaning up codes
Getting ready to run the first test
Add Test page and webpack configurations
Main framework file created by Webpack
Update copyright
Successfully compile framework and use it in test case - not neccessarily work perfectly yet.
End of day commit
End of day commit - Clean up the Components file to make it self-manage.
Render the bubble and border at correct location
First time successfully run the basic tour through static page. Hip Hip Hooray
Clean up SVG example folder, added indicator icon next to text. Also, Allow Click on target to proceed to next step feature
Import Jquery to clean up some codes.
Add Dynamic functions to be executed, reverse jquery features
Change icon and styling for the bubbles
Enable Special features: WaitCondition, SkipCondition and regular Prerequisites Functions.
Minor change to update README file with Trello link for easy management.
Test case for wait for condition. As well as delay feature where it waits out the animation of target element.
Test case for skip condition. Created an element where it randomly appears on the DOM. When it appears the tour doesn't skip, but when it doesn't, tour should skip.
Enable Transition step, allow floating element. And also fixed the issue where the border around box elements. Turned out that I have used the wrong method to get window size.
Change skip condition to process the same way as wait condition.
Add loading icon to transition step so that it can indicate wait process for users.
When the step has a title, show the title in the bubble box.
Resize window trigger re-render, make sure it debounce so that it won't trigger too many events that can harm a complex UI.
Enabled Transition Animation between steps.
Either Transition or noButtons attributes indicate whether current step has any button showed.
Either Transition or noButtons attributes indicate whether current step has any button showed. Missing built file
Make sure click on overlay only ends tour when it is either NOT defined in tour description, or user set it to True, which is redundant. When they set it to false, disable the listener.
Make sure click on overlay only ends tour when it is either NOT defined in tour description, or user set it to True, which is redundant. When they set it to false, disable the listener.
Remove floating style when the bubble switch from floating to normal.
Allow user to stop tours using ESC button
Allow user to stop tours using ESC button
Enable Skip Button only showed when there's a SKIP attribute set in the step.
Added JQuery for easy manipulation events to prevent memory leaks and scroll around smoothly.
Removed Tether, allow NLS for buttons, Enabled block scrolling for modals (2 options).
Solve the issue where there's a small gap between overlays.
Refactor for easy import in actual webpage

Allow customize button text in each step, let user select different element in element block to trigger next step. Make sure that prerequisite functions can modify the step description. This is quite useful for new element creations that you don't know the exact element.
Enable customization for stand-alone bubble, scrolling inside div, drag and drop feature and fixed for mixing up in buttons order.
Missing Image file for test run
Add features for multipage and flashing target.
Enable SavePoint feature, and expose default functions to devs.
Publish to NPM, change to ES5 for now.
Release 1st version to the public
Change styling for 1st release

MESSAGE.value: Test case for skip condition. Created an element where it randomly appears on the DOM. When it appears the tour doesn't skip, but when it doesn't, tour should skip.
Enable Transition step, allow floating element. And also fixed the issue where the border around box elements. Turned out that I have used the wrong method to get window size.
Change skip condition to process the same way as wait condition.
Add loading icon to transition step so that it can indicate wait process for users.

Resize window trigger re-render, make sure it debounce so that it won't trigger too many events that can harm a complex UI.
Enabled Transition Animation between steps.
Either Transition or noButtons attributes indicate whether current step has any button showed.

Make sure click on overlay only ends tour when it is either NOT defined in tour description, or user set it to True, which is redundant. When they set it to false, disable the listener.

Solve the issue where there's a small gap between overlays.
Refactor for easy import in actual webpage
